5#ifndef V8_OBJECTS_BYTECODE_ARRAY_INL_H_
6#define V8_OBJECTS_BYTECODE_ARRAY_INL_H_

8#include "src/common/ptr-compr-inl.h"
9#include "src/heap/heap-write-barrier-inl.h"
10#include "src/interpreter/bytecode-register.h"
11#include "src/objects/bytecode-array.h"
12#include "src/objects/fixed-array-inl.h"
13
14// Has to be the last include (doesn't have include guards):
15#include "src/objects/object-macros.h"
16
17namespace v8 {
18namespace internal {
19
20CAST_ACCESSOR(BytecodeArray)
21OBJECT_CONSTRUCTORS_IMPL(BytecodeArray, ExposedTrustedObject)
22
23SMI_ACCESSORS(BytecodeArray, length, kLengthOffset)
24RELEASE_ACQUIRE_SMI_ACCESSORS(BytecodeArray, length, kLengthOffset)
25PROTECTED_POINTER_ACCESSORS(BytecodeArray, handler_table, TrustedByteArray,
26 kHandlerTableOffset)
27PROTECTED_POINTER_ACCESSORS(BytecodeArray, constant_pool, TrustedFixedArray,
28 kConstantPoolOffset)
29ACCESSORS(BytecodeArray, wrapper, Tagged<BytecodeWrapper>, kWrapperOffset)
30RELEASE_ACQUIRE_PROTECTED_POINTER_ACCESSORS(BytecodeArray,
31 source_position_table,
32 TrustedByteArray,
33 kSourcePositionTableOffset)
34
35uint8_t BytecodeArray::get(int index) const {
36 DCHECK(index >= 0 && index < length());
37 return ReadField<uint8_t>(kHeaderSize + index * kCharSize);
38}
39
40void BytecodeArray::set(int index, uint8_t value) {
41 DCHECK(index >= 0 && index < length());
42 WriteField<uint8_t>(kHeaderSize + index * kCharSize, value);
43}
44
45void BytecodeArray::set_frame_size(int32_t frame_size) {
46 DCHECK_GE(frame_size, 0);
47 DCHECK(IsAligned(frame_size, kSystemPointerSize));
48 WriteField<int32_t>(kFrameSizeOffset, frame_size);
49}
50
51int32_t BytecodeArray::frame_size() const {
52 return ReadField<int32_t>(kFrameSizeOffset);
53}
54
55int BytecodeArray::register_count() const {
56 return static_cast<int>(frame_size()) / kSystemPointerSize;
57}
58
59void BytecodeArray::set_parameter_count(int32_t number_of_parameters) {
60 DCHECK_GE(number_of_parameters, 0);
61 // Parameter count is stored as the size on stack of the parameters to allow
62 // it to be used directly by generated code.
63 WriteField<int32_t>(kParameterSizeOffset,
64 (number_of_parameters << kSystemPointerSizeLog2));
65}
66
67interpreter::Register BytecodeArray::incoming_new_target_or_generator_register()
68 const {
69 int32_t register_operand =
70 ReadField<int32_t>(kIncomingNewTargetOrGeneratorRegisterOffset);
71 if (register_operand == 0) {
72 return interpreter::Register::invalid_value();
73 } else {
74 return interpreter::Register::FromOperand(register_operand);
75 }
76}
77
78void BytecodeArray::set_incoming_new_target_or_generator_register(
79 interpreter::Register incoming_new_target_or_generator_register) {
80 if (!incoming_new_target_or_generator_register.is_valid()) {
81 WriteField<int32_t>(kIncomingNewTargetOrGeneratorRegisterOffset, 0);
82 } else {
83 DCHECK(incoming_new_target_or_generator_register.index() <
84 register_count());
85 DCHECK_NE(0, incoming_new_target_or_generator_register.ToOperand());
86 WriteField<int32_t>(kIncomingNewTargetOrGeneratorRegisterOffset,
87 incoming_new_target_or_generator_register.ToOperand());
88 }
89}
90
91int32_t BytecodeArray::parameter_count() const {
92 // Parameter count is stored as the size on stack of the parameters to allow
93 // it to be used directly by generated code.
94 return ReadField<int32_t>(kParameterSizeOffset) >> kSystemPointerSizeLog2;
95}
96
97void BytecodeArray::clear_padding() {
98 int data_size = kHeaderSize + length();
99 memset(reinterpret_cast<void*>(address() + data_size), 0,
100 SizeFor(length()) - data_size);
101}
102
103Address BytecodeArray::GetFirstBytecodeAddress() {
104 return ptr() - kHeapObjectTag + kHeaderSize;
105}
106
107bool BytecodeArray::HasSourcePositionTable() const {
108 return has_source_position_table(kAcquireLoad);
109}
110
111DEF_GETTER(BytecodeArray, SourcePositionTable, Tagged<TrustedByteArray>) {
112 // WARNING: This function may be called from a background thread, hence
113 // changes to how it accesses the heap can easily lead to bugs.
114 Tagged<Object> maybe_table = raw_source_position_table(kAcquireLoad);
115 if (IsTrustedByteArray(maybe_table))
116 return TrustedByteArray::cast(maybe_table);
117 DCHECK_EQ(maybe_table, Smi::zero());
118 return GetIsolateFromWritableObject(*this)
119 ->heap()
120 ->empty_trusted_byte_array();
121}
122
123void BytecodeArray::SetSourcePositionsFailedToCollect() {
124 TaggedField<Object>::Release_Store(*this, kSourcePositionTableOffset,
125 Smi::zero());
126}
127
128DEF_GETTER(BytecodeArray, raw_constant_pool, Tagged<Object>) {
129 Tagged<Object> value = RawProtectedPointerField(kConstantPoolOffset).load();
130 // This field might be 0 during deserialization.
131 DCHECK(value == Smi::zero() || IsTrustedFixedArray(value));
132 return value;
133}
134
135DEF_GETTER(BytecodeArray, raw_handler_table, Tagged<Object>) {
136 Tagged<Object> value = RawProtectedPointerField(kHandlerTableOffset).load();
137 // This field might be 0 during deserialization.
138 DCHECK(value == Smi::zero() || IsTrustedByteArray(value));
139 return value;
140}
141
142DEF_ACQUIRE_GETTER(BytecodeArray, raw_source_position_table, Tagged<Object>) {
143 Tagged<Object> value =
144 RawProtectedPointerField(kSourcePositionTableOffset).Acquire_Load();
145 // This field might be 0 during deserialization or if source positions have
146 // not been (successfully) collected.
147 DCHECK(value == Smi::zero() || IsTrustedByteArray(value));
148 return value;
149}
150
151int BytecodeArray::BytecodeArraySize() const { return SizeFor(this->length()); }
152
153DEF_GETTER(BytecodeArray, SizeIncludingMetadata, int) {
154 int size = BytecodeArraySize();
155 Tagged<Object> maybe_constant_pool = raw_constant_pool(cage_base);
156 if (IsTrustedFixedArray(maybe_constant_pool)) {
157 size += TrustedFixedArray::cast(maybe_constant_pool)->Size(cage_base);
158 } else {
159 DCHECK_EQ(maybe_constant_pool, Smi::zero());
160 }
161 Tagged<Object> maybe_handler_table = raw_handler_table(cage_base);
162 if (IsTrustedByteArray(maybe_handler_table)) {
163 size += TrustedByteArray::cast(maybe_handler_table)->AllocatedSize();
164 } else {
165 DCHECK_EQ(maybe_handler_table, Smi::zero());
166 }
167 Tagged<Object> maybe_table = raw_source_position_table(kAcquireLoad);
168 if (IsByteArray(maybe_table)) {
169 size += ByteArray::cast(maybe_table)->AllocatedSize();
170 }
171 return size;
172}
173
174CAST_ACCESSOR(BytecodeWrapper)
175OBJECT_CONSTRUCTORS_IMPL(BytecodeWrapper, Struct)
176
177TRUSTED_POINTER_ACCESSORS(BytecodeWrapper, bytecode, BytecodeArray,
178 kBytecodeOffset, kBytecodeArrayIndirectPointerTag)
179
180void BytecodeWrapper::clear_padding() {
181 WriteField<int32_t>(kPadding1Offset, 0);
182 WriteField<int32_t>(kPadding2Offset, 0);
183}
184
185} // namespace internal
186} // namespace v8
